column2: Shire seeks AbbVie bid of close to 53 pounds per share -sources NEW YORK
column3: July 12 Shire Plc is seeking a higher takeover offer from U.S. drugmaker AbbVie Inc  that would value the company at about 31 billion pounds ($53 billion)
column4: according to people familiar with the matter. ~

column2: RPT-UPDATE 2-U.S. Navy maintains grounding order for F-35 fighter jets RAF FAIRFORD
column4: July 12 The U.S. Navy on Friday maintained a grounding order for F-35 B-model and C-model fighter jets built by Lockheed Martin Corp
column5: saying it was still not clear what caused a massive engine failure on an Air Force F-35 jet on June 23. ~U.S. Navy maintains grounding order on F-35 fighter jets WASHINGTON The U.S. Navy on Friday maintained a grounding order for F-35 B-model and C-model fighter jets built by Lockheed Martin Corp given that it remained unclear what had caused a massive engine failure on an Air Force F-35 jet on June 23. ~CORRECTED-U.S. Navy maintains grounding order on F-35 fighter jets WASHINGTON
column6: July 11 The U.S. Navy on Friday maintained a grounding order for F-35 B-model and C-model fighter jets built by Lockheed Martin Corp given that it remained unclear what had caused a massive engine failure on an Air Force F-35 jet on June 23. ~

column2: Swiss chocolate maker Lindt near deal to buy Russell Stover -report WASHINGTON
column3: July 12 Swiss-based chocolate maker Lindt & Spruengli is in advanced discussions to acquire family-owned U.S. candy business Russell Stover
column4: and the two companies could announce an agreement as early as next week
column5: the Financial Times reported on Saturday. ~

column2: Comedian Tracy Morgan released from rehab after June crash Newark N.J Actor and comedian Tracy Morgan was released from a rehabilitation center to finish his recovery at home from a New Jersey crash in June that left him critically injured and killed a fellow passenger
column3: his spokesman said on Saturday. ~Comedian Tracy Morgan sues Walmart over deadly NJ crash Newark
column4: N.J. July 12 Actor and comedian Tracy Morgan has sued Wal-Mart Stores Inc. in New Jersey federal court
column5: alleging the retailer was negligent in connection with the June crash that left the star comedian critically injured and killed a fellow passenger. ~
